column1: 1409575908 54046be60d0cee7c7014ef15 566613 2728831 427 "Dee Paul" https://www.zomato.com/users/dee-paul-566613 "Summer house cafe is a new beautiful cafe
column2: a fabulous place to hang out without having to worry too much about the parking issues
column3: rather its right where the cars start to get stuck up in long jams during the week ends while going to hauz khas village.  Its located in the Aurbindo market opposite the church. Its made at the same place what used to be Kabila restaurant for many years before they shut down last year.  Coming to Summer house cafe
column4: its made beautifully with sitting available both inside and outside.  The inside sitting is huge and spacious and very well spread out. There is a fabulous bar right in front of you as soon as one enters the restaurant.  The service is good and quick
column5: music is good.  I loved the whole feel of the place  . We had warm chicken salad and non vegetarian mezze platter
column6: it was basically a quick lunch . The portions are good and the food taste is good.  Planning to go for Sunday brunch in next couple of days  . A must visit....read more" 307490 "2014-08-29 20:17:39" 198  https://www.zomato.com/review/PYKDly 9 1409323659.0

column1: 1409575909 54046be60d0cee7c7014ef1c 3470841 2465541 2 "Girish Balachandran" https://www.zomato.com/users/girish-balachandran-3470841 "Lovely interiors and outside seating space. The food is impressive
column2: the non-veg mezze platter we ordered had a good combination of different meats and accompaniments. The lamb chops were a disappointment. The meat was too tough and smothered in sauce. It would have been good to have the option of the sauce on the side so you can taste the meat on its own and add the sauce as required. The hostess was kind and offered my table a round of shots when she heard we were there to celebrate one of our friend's becoming a new Dad. A kind gesture that is exactly the kind of thing that makes a good experience great. The staff were efficient but noticed a distinct drop in service after the hostess left. It's a tough industry but service needs to be an internalised culture
column3: not just when the boss is watching." 307490 "2014-08-20 11:07:58" 2 Good https://www.zomato.com/review/ZPpNqo  1408513078.0

1409575909 54046be70d0cee7c7014ef21 3041320 2094711 19 "Amrita Dhar Roy" https://www.zomato.com/users/amrita-dhar-roy-3041320 "I visited Summer House Cafe yesterday with a group of friends. The entrance looks ordinary however once you climb the stairs
column2: the place looks pretty great. The outdoors looks perfect for early winter nights and the ambience indoors is pretty great as well. What I liked the most is that they allow a decent amount of space between tables to ensure each table has a certain amount of privacy. We reserved a table so had no problem at all.The menu boasts of experimental cocktails which unfortunately were not there on the menu. We settled for Sangria which was yummy while the boys had their scotch. For starters we had the beer batter prawns and the non veg mezze platter consisting of fish
column3: lamb and chicken of which the lamb was excellent as was the prawns while the other two were standard.For the main course we had the shepherd's pie
column4: the lamb chop
column5: honey braised chicken and the stew of which the lamp chop and the honey braised chicken were truly delicious
